content.body: annevk: About the `FrozenArray<Element>?` WebIDL design for the various `*Elements` attributes in ARIAMixin https://w3c.github.io/aria/#ARIAMixin: I’m wondering if you happen to know the history behind that
content.formatted_body: annevk: About the FrozenArray<Element>? WebIDL design for the various *Elements attributes in ARIAMixin https://w3c.github.io/aria/#ARIAMixin: I’m wondering if you happen to know the history behind that

content.body:
hmm OK looking at https://github.com/alice/aom/blob/e1d084046dafb9867bab5514c87d8e56f796e239/explainer.md#use-case-2-setting-relationship-properties-without-needing-to-use-idrefs I find this:
> _allow specifying semantic relationships between elements without the need to assign globally unique ID attributes to each element which participates in a relationship_
content.formatted_body:
hmm OK looking at https://github.com/alice/aom/blob/e1d084046dafb9867bab5514c87d8e56f796e239/explainer.md#use-case-2-setting-relationship-properties-without-needing-to-use-idrefs I find this:

allow specifying semantic relationships between elements without the need to assign globally unique ID attributes to each element which participates in a relationship

content.body: sideshowbarker: I think some mixture of premature shipping and the better array type not being quite ready yet. There should certainly be some history captured in whatwg/html issues.
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: I think some mixture of premature shipping and the better array type not being quite ready yet. There should certainly be some history captured in whatwg/html issues.
